snippet: PARIS--Harriet, died on January 1, 2016 at the age of 87. She is survived by her son, Michael Bloomberg and daughter-in-law Terue Tokoro and her brother George David Paris. She is predeceased by daughter Deborah Bloomberg. As the owner and Director of the Peter Pan Laurel School, Dr. Paris was instrumental in educating generations of children of Brooklyn. Dr. Paris loved going to the museums and plays of New York. She volunteered at the Brooklyn museum for more than 20 years and at the Photography Museum in Manhattan. She donated much of her art collection to the City Museum of New York campus on 5th Avenue. Services Monday, 11:30am at "The Riverside" 76 Street and Amsterdam Ave. 1/3
